entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
